newsitem.title: USA: FULL TEXT - Ellison puts off takeover of Apple.
newsitem.headline: FULL TEXT - Ellison puts off takeover of Apple.

text.p: Oracle Corp Chairman Larry Ellision Tuesday said he was putting off, for now, a takeover of Apple Computer Inc. The following is a copy of his statement.

ATHERTON, Calif., April 29 /PRNewswire/ -- Lawrence J. Ellison announced today that at least for the time being, he has decided not to pursue any transaction involving Apple Computer, Inc. (Nasdaq: AAPL) or to otherwise seek control of that firm. Mr. Ellison stated that he has not purchased any Apple stock and is not currently engaged in any discussions with Apple, or Apple shareholders or potential investors concerning any transaction involving Apple. Mr. Ellison stated that he remains interested in developments at Apple and that he may well purchase stock for investment purposes or otherwise, or revisit in the future his decision regarding an acquisition or control of that firm.
